official_title: To permit refund of customs duties on certain drawback entries upon presentation of certificates of delivery.

summary.text: Authorizes the drawback (refund) of duty on a certain entry upon the presentation of the appropriate certificates of delivery to the appropriate customs officer.

titles.title: To permit refund of customs duties on certain drawback entries upon presentation of certificates of delivery.
